description: Bot made by Ernest Tech House - The 1st emerging bot in the whole world

SESSION_ID.description: WhatsApp session string (Base64 encoded creds.json). Leave blank to generate new session.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The bot owner's WhatsApp number in JID format (e.g., 254793859108@whatsapp.net).

SPECIAL_NUMBERS.description: Comma-separated list of additional numbers for special bot interactions/alerts (e.g., 254797934968,254742681410).

BOT_OWNER.description: Primary owner's phone number without country code prefix or spaces (e.g., 2347055249541). Used for specific features like anti-delete.

MODE.description: Bot operating mode. 'public' allows anyone to use commands; 'private' restricts commands to owner/special numbers.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Set to 'true' to keep the bot's WhatsApp status always online.

TYPING.description: Set to 'true' to show a typing indicator when the bot is preparing a response. If true, AUDIO should be false.

AUDIO.description: Set to 'true' to enable audio features/show recording indicator. If true, TYPING should be false.

AUTO_TYPING_INDICATOR_ENABLED.description: Set to 'true' to automatically show a typing indicator upon receiving messages.

TIMEZONE.description: Timezone for bot operations (e.g., 'Africa/Nairobi', 'Europe/Amsterdam'). Used for timed messages.

WEATHER_API_KEY.description: API key for weather services (e.g., OpenWeatherMap). Get one from a weather API provider.

BOT_NAME_DISPLAY.description: The name of your bot as displayed in signatures and greetings.

BOT_VERSION_DISPLAY.description: The version string of the bot.

UNIQUE_ID_DISPLAY.description: A unique identifier for this bot instance.

PORT_SERVER.description: The port number for the bot's web server (for QR/Pair Code generation).

BOT_REPO.description: URL to the bot's GitHub repository.

BOT_GROUP.description: URL to the bot's official WhatsApp group.

BOT_CHANNEL.description: URL to the bot's official WhatsApp channel.

BOT_IMAGE_URL.description: Direct URL to the bot's profile picture or logo.

READ_COMMAND_ENABLED.description: Set to 'true' to mark messages containing commands as read.

UNREAD_COMMAND_ENABLED.description: Set to 'true' to automatically mark all unread messages as read.

BOT_SIGNATURE_ENABLED.description: Set to 'true' to include a signature in bot responses.

BOT_SIGNATURE_TEXT.description: The text content for the bot's signature.

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Set to 'true' to automatically mark all incoming messages as read.

AUTO_VIEW_STATUS_ENABLED.description: Set to 'true' to automatically view WhatsApp status updates (sends blue ticks).

SEND_STATUS_VIEW_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED.description: Set to 'true' to send a message notification after viewing a status.

STATUS_VIEW_NOTIFICATION_TEXT.description: The custom message sent when 'SEND_STATUS_VIEW_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED' is true.

ANTI_DELETE_ENABLED.description: Set to 'true' to enable the anti-delete feature, retrieving deleted messages.

ANTI_DELETE_STORAGE_PATH.description: File path to store retrieved deleted messages.

AUTO_VIEW_CHANNELS_ENABLED.description: Set to 'true' to automatically mark channel messages as read.

SPECIAL_CONTACT_ALERTS.description: Comma-separated list of numbers (without + or spaces) for special contact alerts.

RADAR_API_KEY.description: API key for Radar location services. Leave blank if not used.

REMOVEBG_API_KEY.description: API key for background removal services (e.g., remove.bg). Leave blank if not used.

PYTHON_API_URL.description: URL for a Python API backend, if your bot integrates with one. (e.g., http://localhost:5000).

MORNING_MESSAGE.description: Custom message sent by the bot in the morning.

MID_MESSAGE.description: Custom message sent by the bot in the middle of the day.

NIGHT_MESSAGE.description: Custom message sent by the bot at night.

CREATOR_NAME.description: Your name or the bot creator's name.

CREATOR_TITLE.description: Your professional title or role (e.g., Founder, Developer).

CREATOR_MOTTO.description: A personal motto or inspiring phrase.

CREATOR_NUMBER.description: Your contact number for general inquiries (without + or spaces).

CREATOR_YOUTUBE_URL.description: URL to your YouTube channel. Leave blank if none.

CREATOR_PORTFOLIO_URL.description: URL to your portfolio, GitHub, or LinkedIn profile.

CREATOR_PFP_URL.description: Direct URL to your profile picture for display.
